page.title: 18Housing Development in Alton
page.content:
Alton area has seen a considerable growth in population in recent times, resulting in considerable housing development. This has taken place in three main areas covered by this study : {Ashdell Park}near Windmill Hill, {Wooteys Way}on the site of old Wootey's Farm to the east of Alton and, most recently in {Holybourne}on the Gaskell Close and Thornton End development.
As well as providing private housing for people who work in the locality, the housing is popular with{commuters} who travel to Basingstoke, Winchester, Southampton, Guildford and London to work.
